page.title: All your base are belong to us

rev.comment: /* References in popular culture */ removing non-media covered reference, per consensus on discussion page

*In February 2004, an automated [[news ticker]] on [[News 14 Carolina]], a North Carolina cable channel, was â[[Hack (technology slang)|hacked]]â to display the message on television.<ref>{{cite web | author=Poulsen, Kevin | date=[[2004-03-05]] | work=The Register | url=http://www.theregister.co.uk/2004/03/05/wags_hijack_tv_channels_onscreen/ | title=Wags hijack TV channel's on-screen ticker | accessdate=2006-05-15}}</ref>
*In February 2004, an automated [[news ticker]] on [[News 14 Carolina]], a North Carolina cable channel, was â[[Hack (technology slang)|hacked]]â to display the message on television.<ref>{{cite web | author=Poulsen, Kevin | date=[[2004-03-05]] | work=The Register | url=http://www.theregister.co.uk/2004/03/05/wags_hijack_tv_channels_onscreen/ | title=Wags hijack TV channel's on-screen ticker | accessdate=2006-05-15}}</ref>
*When Google launched [[Google Base]] in October 2005, the phrase was twisted into âAll Your Base Are Belong To Googleâ by search industry watchers such as [[John Battelle]].<ref>{{cite web | author=Battelle, John | date=[[2005-10-25]] | url=http://battellemedia.com/archives/001960.php | title=base.google.com (Or...All Your Base Are Belong To Google) | work=John Battelle's Searchblog | accessdate=2006-05-15}}</ref> Furthermore, in Google's [http://www.google.com/intl/xx-hacker/ Hacker Translation], the âPersonalized Homeâ link has been translated into â4LL `/0|_||2 B453,â which is [[Leet]] for âAll Your Base.â
*When Google launched [[Google Base]] in October 2005, the phrase was twisted into âAll Your Base Are Belong To Googleâ by search industry watchers such as [[John Battelle]].<ref>{{cite web | author=Battelle, John | date=[[2005-10-25]] | url=http://battellemedia.com/archives/001960.php | title=base.google.com (Or...All Your Base Are Belong To Google) | work=John Battelle's Searchblog | accessdate=2006-05-15}}</ref> Furthermore, in Google's [http://www.google.com/intl/xx-hacker/ Hacker Translation], the âPersonalized Homeâ link has been translated into â4LL `/0|_||2 B453,â which is [[Leet]] for âAll Your Base.â
â
*The computer game Empire Earth uses this phrase as a cheat code. Somebody set up us the bomb is also used as a cheat to automatically win the game.
 
*On [[2006-06-01]], the video hosting website [[YouTube]] was taken down temporarily for maintenance. The phrase "ALL YOUR VIDEO ARE BELONG TO US" appeared below the YouTube logo as a placeholder while the site was down. Some users believed the site had been hacked, leading the host to add the message âNo, we haven't been hacked. Get a sense of humor.â<ref>{{cite news
